title._content: Broadway Landing, Appomattox River, Virginia. View of mortar and artillery (LOC)

description._content: Broadway Landing, Appomattox River, Virginia. View of mortar and artillery [1865 Apr.] 1 negative : glass, stereograph, wet collodion ; 4 x 10 in. Notes: Photo shows ordinance in a Union artillery park near Petersburg, Va. Title from Civil War caption books. Caption from negative sleeve: Broadway Landing, Va. April 1865. Forms part of Civil War glass negative collection (Library of Congress). Published in: Lincoln in 3-D / Bob Zeller and John Richter. San Francisco: Chronicle Books, 2010, p. 160. Subjects: United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865. United States--Virginia--Appomatox River Format: Glass negatives--1860-1870. Stereographs--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/cwpb.00008 Call Number: LC-B815- 9
